mapper.insert: insert into board (e_idx, title, content, category, type) values (#{e_idx}, #{title}, #{content}, #{category}, normal)
mapper.select:
select b.*, e.name from board b join employees e on b.e_idx = e.e_idx where b.status = 'N' and b.type = #{type}
and b.nb_title like CONCAT('%', #{searchWord}, '%')
and e.name like CONCAT('%', #{searchWord}, '%')
and b.nb_content like CONCAT('%', #{searchWord}, '%')
order by b.b_idx desc limit #{startNum}, 10
select b.*, e.name from board b join employees e on b.e_idx = e.e_idx where b_idx = #{b_idx}
mapper.update: update board set read_cnt = read_cnt+1 where b_idx=#{b_idx}
update board set b_title=#{b_title}, b_content=#{b_content}, update_date = now() where b_idx = #{b_idx}
update board set status='Y', update_date = now() where b_idx = #{b_idx}
mapper.insert: insert into board_attached (origin_filename, save_filename, b_idx) values (#{origin_filename},#{save_filename},#{b_idx})
